Title: Dasavatharam
Writer: Kamal Haasan (dialogue), Kamal Haasan (story), Atul Tiwari (dialogues)
Actors: Kamal Haasan, Asin, Mallika Sherawat, Napolean
Plot: After realizing the danger of a bio-weapon, a scientist wants to protect it from being misused. The vial accidentally reaches India, and he must race against time to prevent a potential disaster.
